mapper.select: select l.line_cd, l.line_nm, e.eqm_cd, e.line_cd, e.prcs_cd, e.eqm_fg, e.eqm_nm, e.min_temp, e.max_temp, e.eqm_ist_dt, e.chck_perd, e.use_yn, e.prcs_nm, m.img_path, m.eqm_img from eqm e join eqm_line l on e.line_cd = l.line_cd join eqm_img m on e.eqm_cd = m.eqm_cd

select l.line_cd, l.line_nm, e.eqm_cd, e.line_cd, e.prcs_cd, e.eqm_fg, e.eqm_nm, e.min_temp, e.max_temp, e.eqm_ist_dt, e.chck_perd, e.use_yn, e.prcs_nm, m.img_path, m.eqm_img from eqm e join eqm_line l on e.line_cd = l.line_cd join eqm_img m on e.eqm_cd = m.eqm_cd where 1=1 and e.eqm_cd Like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and e.eqm_nm Like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and e.prcs_nm Like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into eqm (eqm_cd, line_cd, prcs_cd, eqm_nm, eqm_ist_dt, min_temp, max_temp, chck_perd, use_yn, prcs_nm, eqm_fg) values (cre_code(#{eqmFg}), #{lineCd}, #{prcsCd}, #{eqmNm}, #{eqmIstDt}, #{minTemp},#{maxTemp},#{chckPerd}, #{useYN}, #{prcsNm},#{eqmFg})
insert into eqm_img (eqm_cd, prcs_cd, img_path, eqm_img) values(cre_code2(#{eqmFg}), #{prcsCd}, #{imgPath}, #{eqmImg})
mapper.update: update eqm set line_cd = #{lineCd}, prcs_cd = #{prcsCd}, eqm_nm = #{eqmNm}, eqm_ist_dt = #{eqmIstDt}, min_temp = #{minTemp}, max_temp = #{maxTemp}, chck_perd = #{chckPerd}, use_yn = #{useYN}, prcs_nm = #{prcsNm}, eqm_fg = #{eqmFg} where eqm_cd = #{eqmCd}
